Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it only provides a description of the video without any additional evidence or sources to verify its authenticity or connection to the Sriwijaya Air Flight SJ 182 crash.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video is depicting the passengers panicking before the crash of Sriwijaya Air Flight SJ 182, without providing any concrete evidence or context to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for the video, such as the possibility that it may be a different incident or unrelated to the Sriwijaya Air Flight SJ 182 crash.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video was previously posted on TikTok in 2019 and was related to a different incident of turbulence on a different flight.
Exaggerate: The claim may be exaggerating the significance of the video by implying that it shows the passengers panicking before the crash, without providing sufficient evidence to support this claim.
